name: copilotprompts-customer-comments-agent
title: Customer Comments Agent
shortDescription: An agent designed to assist in managing customer comments about services at provided facilities by analyzing form submissions and drafting responses based on complaint handling guidelines.
longDescription: This Customer Comments Agent analyzes form submissions from customers and drafts responses based on a Guidelines for Handling Complaints document. It helps manage customer feedback by filtering submissions based on criteria, drafting acknowledgement emails, and preparing resolution responses. The agent maintains a professional and neutral tone while showing empathy for customer concerns, ensuring all communication is clear, consistent, and aligned with organizational guidelines.
